content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 0(4), Espanyol 0(2).
Second Half ends, Barcelona 0, Espanyol 0.
Attempt saved. Paco Alcácer (Barcelona) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is saved in the bottom left corner.
Paco Alcácer (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Naldo (Espanyol).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Adrià Pedrosa.

Penalty Shootout ends, Barcelona 0(4), Espanyol 0(2).
Penalty saved! José Manuel Jurado (Espanyol) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the top left corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 0(4), Espanyol 0(2). Abel Ruiz (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 0(3), Espanyol 0(2). Mario Hermoso (Espanyol) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Goal!  Barcelona 0(3), Espanyol 0(1). Yerry Mina (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 0(2), Espanyol 0(1). Álex López (Espanyol) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.
Goal!  Barcelona 0(2), Espanyol 0. Sergi Palencia (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty missed! Bad penalty by Sergi Darder (Espanyol) right footed shot is just a bit too high. Sergi Darder should be disappointed.
Goal!  Barcelona 0(1), Espanyol 0. Paco Alcácer (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.
Penalty Shootout begins Barcelona 0, Espanyol 0.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
